issue.title: [Python/Documentation] Fix wrong path in the pyarrow README
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3961](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3961). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

pip install -r ../docs/requirements.txt
python setup.py build_sphinx -s ../doc/source
```

The second path should be `../docs/source`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3961?focusedCommentId=16713667) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3127
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3127>
